segments.text: Tina Li , Financial Planner , how may I be of service ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Tina . An acquaintance of mine has just told me that your bank has started a new Personal Wealth Management Service . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It certainly is . You can do almost anything with it , anytime , anywhere .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How would I go about applying for this service ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All you need to do is sign up at any one of our branches and you can use the service right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's so simple . I'll come by my local branch later this afternoon and get it set up . Thank you very much , Tina .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a pleasure . Thanks for calling Lincoln Bank .
segments.speaker: S1
